Town Hall Meeting – Meet our new Mayor
--------------------------------------

Posted on
[May 27, 2025](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/uncategorized/town-hall-meeting-meet-our-new-mayor/)


[Town Hall Meeting](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/Town-Hall-Meeting-5-27-2025.pdf)

Tuesday, May 27, 2025

Meet our new Mayor Todd Day

Come hear about what we are working on, what is coming, and how you can help the future of our Town!
